forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy. Cloudy skies will become partly cloudy this afternoon. High near -5C. Winds E at 30 to 50 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy this morning, becoming partly cloudy this afternoon. High around 25F. Winds E at 20 to 30 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low -12C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 12F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High -6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 24F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low -14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 8F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High -4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 27F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low near -10C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 16F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few snow showers during the afternoon. High near -5C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few snow showers during the afternoon. High 24F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow likely. Low -7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. 12-20cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow likely. Low 22F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 5 to 8 inches.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will give way to rain showers during the afternoon. High 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 90%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning changing to rain showers late. High 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 90%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 32F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. High 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. High 41F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow in the evening, becoming all snow late. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 80%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow in the evening, becoming all snow late. Low 34F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 80%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers that will mix with rain showers later. High 3C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers becoming mixed with rain later. High near 40F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the evening transitioning to snow showers overnight. Low 1C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the evening transitioning to snow showers overnight. Low near 35F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early will give way to a mixture of rain and snow showers in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers mixing with rain in the afternoon. High 39F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low around 0C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low 34F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. High 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. High 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.
